:py:mod:`pyslam.demos.monocular_features`
=========================================

.. py:module:: pyslam.demos.monocular_features

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Contains a demo that captures frames from
   a monocular file camera, extracts ORB features,
   and displays them with PyGame



Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   pyslam.demos.monocular_features.run



.. py:function:: run() -> None

   Runs the monocular features demo.
